original: // rdzogs pa chen po klong sde rdo rje zam pa'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs ni /
analyzed: rdzogs ba chen po klong sde rdo rje zam ba bla brgyud gsol debs ni

original: thog ma'i sangs rgyas kun bzang rdo rje sems //
analyzed: thogs ma sangs rgya kun bzang rdo rje sems

original: sems dag nor bu dga' rab rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal bshes gnyen sh+r+ai sid+ha la //
analyzed: sems dag nor bu dga rab rdo rje dang jam dpal bshes gnyen sh+r+ai sid+ha la

original: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so bdag brgyud byin gyis rlobs

original: bee ro tsa na spang ston mi pham mgon //
analyzed: bee ro tsa na spong ston mi pham mgon

original: ngan lam byang rgyal za ngam rin chen dbyig /
analyzed: ngan lam byang rgyal za ngam rin chen dbyig

original: khu 'gyur gsal mchog nyang ston byang chub grags //
analyzed: khu gyur gsal mchog nyang ston byang chub grags

original: gsol ba shes rab 'byung gnas rba sgom ye shes mtshan //
analyzed: gsol ba shes rab byung gnas rba sgom ye shes mtshan

original: d+harma bo d+hi 'dzeng dkar jo sras dang // kun bzang rdo rje sangs rgyas sdong po la //
analyzed: d+harma bo d+hi dzeng dkar jo sras dang kun bzang rdo rje sangs rgya sdong po la

original: gsol ba ye shes byang chub ye shes dbang po dang // ngur ston bsod 'od rdo rje dbang phyug zhabs //
analyzed: gsol ba ye shes byang chub ye shes dbang po dang ngur ston bsod d rdo rje dbang phyug zhabs

original: bsod nams rgyal mtshan shes rab rgyal mtshan la //
analyzed: bsod nams rgyal mtshan shes rab rgyal mtshan la

original: gsol ba gzhon nu shes rab gzhon nu grags pa dang // sangs rgyas bzang po brtson 'grus dbang phyug zhabs //
analyzed: gsol ba gzhon nu shes rab gzhon nu grags ba dang sangs rgya bzang po brtson grus dbang phyug zhabs

original: mtha' bzhi grags rin sh+aakya rgyal po la //
analyzed: mtha bzhi grags rin sh+aakya rgyal po la

original: gsol ba 'gos lo gzhon dpal spyan snga chos kyi grags //
analyzed: gsol ba go lo gzhon dpal spyan snga chos kyi grags

original: chos kyi blo gros khyung tshang blo gros dpal //
analyzed: chos kyi blo gros khyung tshang blo gros dpal

original: karma gu ru chos dbang lhun grub la //
analyzed: karma gu ru chos dbang lhun grub la

original: gsol ba chos dbang kun bzang kun bzang chos kyi rgyal //
analyzed: gsol ba chos dbang kun bzang kun bzang chos kyi rgyal

original: 'gyur med rdo rje rin chen rnam rgyal dang // pad+ma bstan 'dzin o d+ai ya na la //
analyzed: gyur med rdo rje rin chen rnam rgyal dang pad+ma ston dzin o d+ai ya na la

original: gsol ba rig 'dzin bzang po pad+ma mang+ga la //
analyzed: gsol ba rig dzin bzang po pad+ma mang+ga la

original: rig pa'i rdo rje 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang //
analyzed: rig ba rdo rje jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang

original: nges don dbang po rtsa brgyad bla ma la /
analyzed: nges don dbang po rtsa brgyad bla ma la

original: gsol ba 'debs so bdag rgyud byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so bdag brgyud byin gyis rlobs

original: rang sems gsal stong 'dzin med rtogs pa dang // yul kun snang stong bden med 'char ba dang // spangs blangs yongs bral 'khor 'das 'khrul pa zhig /
analyzed: rang sems gsal stong dzin med rtogs ba dang yul kun snang stong bden med char ba dang spong blangs yongs bral khor da khrul ba jig

original: gnyug ma'i gtan sa zin par byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: gnyug ma gtan sa zin ba byin gyis rlobs

original: zhes snyan brgyud rdo rje zam pa'i bla brgyud gsol 'debs gter chen 'gyur med rdo rje'i gsung la gter chen man gyi kha skong dz+ny+aa nas so ////
analyzed: zhes snyan brgyud rdo rje zam ba bla brgyud gsol debs gter chen gyur med rdo rje gsung la gter chen man gyi kha skong dz+ny+aa nas so
